# skipInvisibles

**Type Property**

The enumerator skips “hidden” or “invisible” objects.

## Declaration

```swift
static var skipInvisibles: CFURLEnumeratorOptions { get }
```

## Constants

- **descendRecursively**: The enumerator recurses into each subdirectory enumerated.
- **generateFileReferenceURLs**: The enumerator generates file reference URLs instead of file path URLs.
- **skipPackageContents**: The enumerator skips package directory contents.
- **includeDirectoriesPreOrder**: If provided along with the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFURLEnumeratorOptions/descendRecursively] option, the recursive enumerator returns a directory’s URL before returning the URLs of the directory’s descendents.
- **includeDirectoriesPostOrder**: If provided along with the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFURLEnumeratorOptions/descendRecursively] option, the recursive enumerator returns a directory’s URL after returning the URLs of the directory’s descendents.
